name: searchspot
description: Search suggestions from multiple search engines to get you answers faster
author: Bryan Clark (http://clarkbw.net/) <clarkbw@gmail.com>

preferences.name: allowStatisticsReporting
preferences.title: Participate with the anonymouse community statistics
preferences.description: Anonymously share statistics about the search engines you use to help improve this add-on

preferences.name: allowSearchEngineCollector
preferences.title: Automatic search engine collection
preferences.description: Find and collect new search engines from the sites you visit
